mapper.select: SELECT STAFF_ID,STAFF_NAME,STAFF_STATUS,EXT FROM SYS_STAFF WHERE STAFF_ID IN (SELECT STAFF_ID FROM SYS_ROLE_ASSIGN WHERE ROLE_ID LIKE 'amlblacklist%') and STAFF_ID like '%${condition.userId}%' and STAFF_NAME like '%${condition.userName}%' and STAFF_STATUS like '%${condition.userStatus}%'

select r.ROLE_ID as roleId, r.ROLE_NAME as roleName, r.EXT as roleDescribe, (select s.staff_name from sys_staff s where s.staff_id = r.UPD_USER) as modifyUser, UPD_TIME as modifyData, r.UPD_USER as staffId from SYS_ROLE r 1=1 and ROLE_STATUS="1" AND ROLE_ID LIKE 'amlblacklist%' and ROLE_NAME like '%${condition.roleName}%'
SELECT R.ROLE_NAME AS roleName FROM SYS_ROLE R WHERE R.ROLE_ID = #{0}
SELECT T.STAFF_ID AS staffId, S.STAFF_NAME AS staffName, T.ROLE_ID AS roleId FROM SYS_ROLE_ASSIGN T LEFT JOIN SYS_STAFF S ON S.STAFF_ID = T.STAFF_ID WHERE T.ROLE_ID LIKE 'amlblacklist%'
